title: Picking up litter: Pointless exercise or powerful tool in the battle to ...
body: Indonesia, which is the world's second-biggest source of marine pollution after China, has signed up to the UN's Clean Seas campaign and pledged to reduce marine plastic waste by 70 per cent by 2025. It plans to curb the use of plastic bags, boost recycling services and launch cleanup campaigns. Some islanders are already hard at work.
